title: Department of Metal Forming Processes and Machines

firstPersonCard.name: Ihor Yuriiovych Prykhodko
firstPersonCard.description: Doctor of Technical Sciences, Senior Researcher
firstPersonCard.researchDirection: Research, improvement of existing and development of new technological processes of hot and cold strip rolling

items: Development of scientific and technological foundations, creation of new and improvement of existing technological processes of continuous section rolling.
Development of scientific and technological foundations of high-speed wire rod rolling on modern wire mills equipped with finishing block stands.
Development of theory and technology for cold rolling-drawing processes of simple and shaped high-precision profiles, expanding their range.
Study of technological factors influence in processes of hot rolling, scale removal, cold rolling, annealing, skin pass rolling, and coating on sheet steel quality.
Development and research of new methods for optimizing rolling processes and quality control of sheet products.
Study of technological parameters influence of hot, cold rolling and skin pass on the efficiency, stability, reliability of sheet mill equipment and their productivity.
Creation of effective methods for forming optimal temperature and stress state of coiled strip metal in hot and cold rolling and annealing in bell-type furnaces.
Development of new algorithms, measurement systems, and automatic control systems for strip rolling processes.

Study of dynamic processes affecting rolling stability and product quality, reliability, and service life of sheet mills, development of calculation methods and automated systems for monitoring dynamic loads and vibration.
Technologies and equipment for cryogenic treatment in rolling production and mechanical engineering.
